title: GitPython doesn't support WorkTree
body:
as discovered while troubleshooting merge conflicts and running tests while being under a worktree "clone" (https://github.com/datalad/datalad/pull/694/files#r77371433)

``` shell
$> DATALAD_LOGLEVEL=2 nosetests -s -v /home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-master/datalad/distribution/tests/test_dataset.py:test_require_dataset
...
2016-09-02 12:09:17,143 [DEBUG  ] Resolved dataset: <Dataset path=/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-master> (dataset.py:577)
> /home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-master/datalad/distribution/dataset.py(107)repo()
-> with swallow_logs():
(Pdb) n
> /home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-master/datalad/distribution/dataset.py(108)repo()
-> for cls, ckw, kw in (
(Pdb) n
> /home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-master/datalad/distribution/dataset.py(109)repo()
-> (AnnexRepo, {'allow_noninitialized': True}, {'init': False}),
(Pdb) n
> /home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-master/datalad/distribution/dataset.py(110)repo()
-> (GitRepo, {}, {})
(Pdb) 
> /home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-master/datalad/distribution/dataset.py(112)repo()
-> if cls.is_valid_repo(self._path, **ckw):
(Pdb) n
2016-09-02 12:09:23,793 [ERROR  ] <class 'git.exc.WorkTreeRepositoryUnsupported'>: /home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.git/worktrees/datalad-debian (gitrepo.py:480)
> /home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad-master/datalad/distribution/dataset.py(110)repo()
-> (GitRepo, {}, {})
```

I will fix that test to not run in curdir anyways, but this issue is to alert us of GitPython absent support of worktrees :-/
